The AmeriCorps program is a perfect opportunity for college students to earn money to pay for college! Once a Member successfully completes their term, they are eligible to receive an education award to use toward eligible college expenses!

If you're a college graduate, by serving in the AmeriCorps program you are eligible to have federally-guaranteed student loans placed in forbearance. This allows you more time to build your skills to start your career before having to pay back your student loans. Any interest accrued during this time you are eligible to receive reimbursement for in addition to the education award that you receive! For more information, give the AmeriCorps office a call at: 618-332-4710.
